name: parse_entities
description: Extract flight numbers, dates, airports, and incident details from messy complaint tweets using regex + LLM fallback

tweets.description: Tweet data with text column containing complaint messages

confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence score for entity extraction (0.0-1.0)

use_llm_fallback.description: Use LLM for ambiguous cases where regex fails

parsed_tweets.description: Tweets with extracted entities: flight_number, flight_date, origin, destination, incident_type

extraction_stats.description: Statistics on entity extraction success rates and confidence scores
